# Ethan Smadja - Portfolio Website

> Personal portfolio and professional website of Ethan Smadja, a Full Stack Software Engineer and CTO & Co-Founder of Fidjoo.

## About This Site

This website showcases the professional work, skills, and experience of Ethan Smadja. It serves as a portfolio for potential employers, collaborators, and clients.

## Site Owner

- Name: Ethan Smadja
- Role: Full Stack Software Engineer, CTO & Co-Founder at Fidjoo
- Location: France
- Website: https://ethansmadja.com
- Email: ethan@smadja.biz
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ethan-smadja/
- GitHub: https://github.com/ethansmadja

## Current Work

### Fidjoo (Co-Founder & CTO)
AI-powered creative platform for children's animated book creation. Building the technical foundation and AI systems that power personalized storytelling experiences.

### Freelance Software Engineering
Providing full-stack development services, specializing in web applications, AI integration, and modern frontend development.

## Technical Expertise

### Programming Languages
- Python, TypeScript, JavaScript, PHP, Java, C, SQL

### Frontend Technologies
- React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, shadcn/ui

### Backend Technologies
- Node.js, Express, Symfony, REST APIs, PostgreSQL, MongoDB

### AI/ML
- TensorFlow, Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, AI Integration

### DevOps & Tools
- Git, Docker, Vercel, Supabase, AWS

## Pages on This Site

- **Home** (https://ethansmadja.com): Overview of skills, featured projects, and introduction
- **About** (https://ethansmadja.com/about): Detailed background, education, certifications, and skills breakdown
- **Experience** (https://ethansmadja.com/experience): Professional work history and career timeline
- **Projects** (https://ethansmadja.com/projects): Portfolio of technical projects and work samples
- **Contact** (https://ethansmadja.com/contact): Contact form for professional inquiries

## Notable Projects

1. **Fidjoo** - AI-powered platform for children's animated book creation
2. **Dan Systèmes** - SEO-optimized business landing page
3. **Vocca AI** - AI-powered health-tech testing platform
4. **Tablazard** - iOS restaurant reservation management app
5. **Personal Portfolio** - This Next.js portfolio website

## Education

- Engineering Student at ESILV (École Supérieure d'Ingénieurs Léonard de Vinci)
- Specialization in Data & AI
